org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.desc

Class ScriptInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.desc.ScriptInput
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScriptInputStatic, ScriptInputUser

    public abstract class ScriptInput
extends Object
    Integrates inputs to the grid that come from the use case descriptions with those that are fed through the workflow. this class controls name and data storage of one input, no matter where the data comes from
